item.description:
Independence Day Tea Party

UPDATED SCHEDULE

10 AM - Noon Guided Tours of the historic Freedom Trail

Noon - 2 PM Speakers Program - On Boston Commons
3-4 PM Musical Entertainment - Bring your own picnic to Christopher Columbus Park (Boston Harbor)
4 PM - 6 PM - Speakers Program

Speakers scheduled to appear:

Yaron Brook - Ayn Rand Institute
Todd Feinburg - WRKO - 680 AM
Carla Howell - Center for Limited Government
Ralph Benko - The WEBster's Dictionary
Barry Hinkley - Mass FairTax
Paul Jehle - Plymouth Rock Foundation
Doug Bennett - Candidate for Boston City Council
Kamal Jain - Mass-Truth.org
Jason Healey - StopUniversalHealthcare.org
Brad Marston - Foundation for Conservative Solutions, LLC
Sheridan Folger - SovereigntyAlliance.org
Jim Stergios - Pioneer Institute
Jack Marino - Conservative Film Maker
Sean Ryan - Candidate for Boston City Council
Mike Kelleher - CloseTheTolls.org
John Hanson - Zap The IRS
John Ridpath - Ayn Rand Institute

ONE if by Land!
TWO if by Sea!!
THREE if by Congress!!!

Welcome to the Facebook Home of the Premier Independence Day Tea Party in New England, home of the Original Boston Tea Party.

**WE NEED FOLKS TO PARTICIPATE ON THIS DAY FROM THEIR STATE AS WELL. CALL ONE OF OUR LIVE SHOWS ON RADIO OR USTREAM TV AND UPDATE THE ENTIRE NETWORK ON THE TEA PARTY IN YOUR STATE! WE MUST TIE EVERYTHING TOGETHER.**

*Help Make This The Biggest Event Of The Year. If You Can Not Attend In Person, You Can Attend 'Virtually'. Tie Your City Into This Event!*

The insidious growth of the federal government has gone far enough.

I shall know but one country. The ends I aim at shall be my country’s, my God’s, and Truth’s. I was born an American; I live an American; I shall die an American.” ~Daniel Webster

Our "Federal" Government is quickly becoming a "National" Government. While their supporters are chanting their mantra of "Yes We Can", those of us who have read and understand the Constitution say "No You Can't!"

In December of 1773 184 people rose up against an over-reaching excessive government and literally changed the world. On July 4th We Will Do It Again!

EVERYONE CAN AND SHOULD PARTICIPATE. Regardless of what state you are in please try to make it in person to this historic event. If you can not attend in person YOU CAN STILL PARTICIPATE IN THIS EVENT.

Join us in person, by mail or online. Join us on Blog Talk Radio, UStreamTV and Twitter.

We will be holding a HUGE combined Tea Party in the New England Area on July 4th.

The sponsors of this event are "The Foundation for Conservative Solutions" , "The Sovereignty Alliance" and "The 912 Project"

Official Sites

http://bostonteaparty...

--
Stephen Ayer
Roundup Marketing Group, LLC
